recipesJson.name: Deep Fried S'mores
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
Everyone loves a S'more, especially with Summer, cookouts, and the beach.  But it is too hot to stand by the fire and roast a marshmallow.  So this recipe gives you that yummy S'more, without the fire, but better yet you get it deep Fried in a pastry dough. Delicious!!
I built this recipe starting with FLV Smore.   This is a great concentrate with the chocolate flavor, I just built upon it for a more delicious smore.   I added FW Graham Cracker,  OOO Marshmallow (Vanilla), and a touch of  VTA Dark Chocolate. To give the deep fried taste, WF Deep Fried Pastry Dough and a little FA Joy.  
If you do not have the OOO Marshmallow (Vanilla), you van sub with Cap SL Whipped Marshmallow, or a marshmallow you like.  
Steep 3 days for excellence, but it is delicious after shake. 
Enjoy!!

Check out my original version of this if you enjoy a more chocolatey vape.  It is good as well..
http://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/2430511/Deep%20fried%20S%E2%80%99mores
